Favourite animals? (select any that apply)

Implementing this component

The Markup

				
	<form id="check-options-group">
		<fieldset class="check-options t-white">
			<legend class="check-options-title">Favourite animals? (select any that apply)</legend>
			<input class="check-options-input" id="check_option1" type="checkbox" name="animals" value="Dogs" />
			<label class="check-options-label" for="check_option1">Dogs</label>
			<input class="check-options-input" id="check_option2" type="checkbox" name="animals" value="Cats" />
			<label class="check-options-label" for="check_option2">Cats</label>
			<input class="check-options-input" id="check_option3" type="checkbox" name="animals" value="Donkeys" />
			<label class="check-options-label" for="check_option3">Donkeys</label>
			<input class="check-options-input" id="check_option4" type="checkbox" name="animals" value="Horses" />
			<label class="check-options-label" for="check_option4">Horses</label>
			<input class="check-options-input" id="check_option5" type="checkbox" name="animals" value="Dolphins" />
			<label class="check-options-label" for="check_option5">Dolphins</label>
			<input class="check-options-input" id="check_option6" type="checkbox" name="animals" value="Sharks" />

		</fieldset>

The CSS: Theming

				
	/* Theming */
	.t-white.check-options input[type="checkbox"]:checked + label {
		background:#222;
		color:#fff;
		border-color:#333;
	}
	.t-white.check-options input[type="checkbox"]:active + label {
		color:#fff;
		background:#444;
	}
	.t-white.check-options input[type="checkbox"]:focus + label {
		background:#444;
		color:#fff;
	}

	.t-white .check-options-label {
		background:#eee;
		border-color: #111;
		color:#111;
	}
	.t-white .check-options-label:hover {
		background:#333;
		color:#fff;
	}

The CSS: Component

				
	.check-options-label {
		cursor:pointer;
		padding:0.5em 0.75em;
		display:inline-block;
		border:1px solid;
		text-align:center;
		text-decoration:none;
		transition:background 0.3s ease;
	}
	@media all and (min-width: 40em){
		.check-options-label {
			padding: 3em;
		}
	}
	/* Qualifier, since technique requires
	adjacent selector,
		we use sibling to cut the mustard
	*/
	.check-options-title ~ .check-options-input {
	   position:absolute;
	   visibility:none;
	   opacity:0;
	   left:-9999px;
	}
